name: Clanker
description: Clanker is a cryptocurrency project inspired by the rise of automation and AI in everyday life. The name “Clanker” has entered popular culture as a term for automated systems, ranging from streaming bots and delivery drones to AI assistants. The $CLANKER token builds on this cultural shift by serving as a meme-based project that merges digital culture with blockchain. It aims to create a recognizable brand within web3 that reflects the growing role of robotics and AI in modern society.
